## Statin shiny app

Shiny app for statin use Exploratory Analysis

---

## Slide 2

1. This Coursera project application is an Exploratory Analysis
of the effect of statin on patients with diabetes.(The data is test data, not real patients)
2. It is built using shiny and ggplot2 libraries.
3. It allows the user to visualize cholesterol(ldl levels) changes in a sample of patients.
4. The ldl levels were taking in 2013 and 2014.
